overview: Pabllo Vittar celebrates his 5-year career with the audiovisual project "I Am Pabllo", a show that brings the four elements of nature as a theme and has the biggest hits of all his albums. The mega show was recorded at Oca, at Ibirapuera Park, in São Paulo, and has four stages, lots of choreography, extravagant looks and inspiration from the k-pop universe.
title: I AM PABLLO
